name: Monsieur le Pomme
description:
Monsieur le Pomme is a very quick, simple Snake clone made in RPG Maker MV. It is intended to be used for a future eZine tutorial on the various mechanics involved. It is not a serious project, but does provide the HBGames Arcade with a snake game amongst its ranks.

Credits

Sound: Defrini (Free Music Archive), Rohanpp786, HoBoTrails
Graphics: RPG Makers XP and MV, iblushay
Plugins: SomeRandomDude, Galv, Jackell Dragon, Yami, dbchest
